property.name: Addresses
property.tp:docstring:
Array of tuples of IPv6 address/prefix/gateway.
Deprecated: use AddressData and Gateway.

property.name: AddressData
property.tp:docstring: Array of IP address data objects. All addresses will include "address" (an IP address string), and "prefix" (a uint). Some addresses may include additional attributes.

property.name: Routes
property.tp:docstring:
Tuples of IPv6 route/prefix/next-hop/metric.
Deprecated: use RouteData

property.name: RouteData
property.tp:docstring: Array of IP route data objects. All routes will include "dest" (an IP address string) and "prefix" (a uint). Some routes may include "next-hop" (an IP address string), "metric" (a uint), and additional attributes.

property.name: Domains
property.tp:docstring: A list of domains this address belongs to.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping property names to variant boxed values
